title: Integrating care economy principles into classroom teaching
description: Integrating care economy principles into classroom teaching
content:
Scenario: Integrating care economy principles into classroom teaching
    Given Sarah teaches in a traditional school system
    And she wants to bring care economy into curriculum
    When Sarah designs lessons for her students
    Then the educational_elohim should provide age-appropriate resources
    And she should teach that care work creates value
    And students should learn through concrete experiences
    And classroom should become care economy learning environment
    And Sarah should spread care economy principles to hundreds of children
